text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian's whirlwind that followed from the “Triple Crown 
Horse Girl”, continued even in the new year.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
The last straight line from the 4th corner! 
Narita Brian, is in the lead!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Pushing forward!! The difference with the subsequent one is 
opening up more and more!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
No one can catch up with her anymore! Now it's just a stand-alone 
state!! 6 lengths, 7 lengths difference now, Goal!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
There's nothing to hide from Narita Brian!! 
Winning the “Hanshin Grand Prize”!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you for your hard work, Brian-san.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Even though it is a long-distance race, you broke your self-best 
time. It is that you do not know where to stay.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
You will be selected as the “Year's representative Horse Girl”, 
and the race will be a landslide victory like this…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian, your run by the only team <Sirius> can make the 
Twinkle series even more exciting! Thanks!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …You're welcome.

Next is the “Emperor Prize (Spring)” this is 
the race that your older sister won last year. 
Let's aim for victory for the sisters!

Next is the “Emperor Prize (Spring)” this is 
the race that your older sister won last year. 
Let's aim for victory for the sisters!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, winning is natural. …Well, before 
that I will finish the winning live.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
It is said that President Rudolf's seven crowns are also certain, 
just how many records will be put out this year.

As Mejiro McQueen said, everyone has high 
expectations for Narita Brian's success.

What kind of run will you show me, I could not suppress the 
excitement as if I was a fan who cheered for her.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Brian!! Today's run was also the best!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text:
It has already been decided the“Emperor 
Prize (Spring)” center is Brian!!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Woaah～, Brian-san… That's the race of a triple crown horse girl!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Maya, will try such an exciting race too!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: So you were her after all.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Older sister… What about your leg?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: It will still take time to get back. My body has become numb.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You're the same as ever… From the landslide victory of the year's 
representative horse girl to the “Hanshin Grand Prize”, just how 
far are you going to go?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
There is no such thing as setting a goal somewhere. Crossing the 
goal in front of you… that's all.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: …That's right. You're always there, because of an endless goal.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But it also looks like you're having fun. You really have a 
strong desire to run.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I'm having fun…? Even though no matter how 
many times you run, I won't be satisfied?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Yeah, without a doubt.
A few days after the “Hanshin Grand Prize”ー

Training was being held in anticipation of the “Emperor Prize 
(Spring)”, which Narita Brian will run next.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …*Pant*.
You look a little tired, are you okay?
You look a little tired, are you okay?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: No problem, I'm not running with my full power yet.

I hope so, but because of the steepness, let's 
run the woodchip course next time.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I got it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Brian-san has the feeling to run anywhere.

The feeling is based on the results that exceed expectations. I 
can't help but hope for the next one.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Rice is also looking forward to what 
kind of race she will race next.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Although I share the same feeling, I can't only put expectations 
on her. I have to follow Brian-san.

Me too, I'm going to do my best to get Brian to the races with 
the best possible performance.

Me too, I'm going to do my best to get Brian to the races with 
the best possible performance.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …Huh!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Speaking of challenging the race, isn't it about time for Brian's 
registration for the race?
Come to think of it, that's true.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Phew～… we would be in trouble if we forgot.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Even if you get her to the best possible performance, it is 
meaningless if you don't get her in the race.

I'll finish the registration before I forget. In the meantime, 
McQueen train everyoneー

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …Huh!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Brian-san!?
W-What's wrong!?
W-What's wrong!?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: *Pant*…*Pant*…!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Urgh!?
